00016   type :: source_type
00017 
00018     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! energy range for fission source
00019     real(8)              :: cdf_width ! width of cdf bins from 0 to 1
00020 
00021   end type source_type
00022 
00023   type :: thermal_type
00024 
00025     integer               :: kTsize    ! size of kT vector
00026     integer               :: cdfsize   ! size of cdf
00027     real(8), allocatable  :: kTvec(:)  ! vector of kT values
00028     real(8), allocatable  :: Erat(:,:) ! energy
00029     real(8)               :: cdf_width ! width of cdf interval from 0 to 1 
00030     
00031   end type thermal_type
00032 
00033   type :: iso_type
00034 
00035     real(8)               :: N           ! number density
00036     real(8)               :: A           ! atomic weight
00037     real(8)               :: alpha       ! (A-1)^2/(A+1)^2
00038     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_capt(:)  ! capture micro xs
00039     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_scat(:)  ! scattering micro xs
00040     real(8), allocatable  :: xs_fiss(:)  ! fission micro xs
00041     character(len=255)    :: name        ! name of isotope
00042 
00043     logical               :: thermal     ! thermal scatterer
00044     type(thermal_type)    :: thermal_lib ! thermal library
00045 
00046   end type iso_type
00047 
00048   type, public ::  material_type
00049 
00050     type(source_type)           :: source        ! the source of neutrons
00051     type(iso_type), allocatable :: isotopes(:)   ! 1-D array of isotopes in mat
00052     integer                     :: nisotopes     ! number of isotopes in mat
00053     integer                     :: curr_iso      ! the current isotope
00054     integer                     :: npts          ! number of points in energy
00055     real(8)                     :: E_width       ! width of energy interval
00056     real(8)                     :: E_min         ! min energy
00057     real(8)                     :: E_max         ! max energy
00058     real(8)                     :: vol           ! volume of region
00059     real(8), allocatable        :: totalxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic tot xs
00060     real(8), allocatable        :: scattxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic scat xs
00061     real(8), allocatable        :: absorxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic abs xs
00062     real(8), allocatable        :: captuxs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic capt xs
00063     real(8), allocatable        :: fissixs(:,:)  ! array of macroscopic fiss xs
00064 
00065   end type material_type

00069 !===============================================================================
00070 ! SET_UP_MATERIALS
00073 
00074   subroutine setup_material(this,emin,emax,nisotopes,vol)
00075 
00076     ! formal variables
00077     type(material_type) :: this      ! a material
00078     real(8)             :: emin      ! minimum energy to consider
00079     real(8)             :: emax      ! maximum energy to consider
00080     real(8)             :: vol       ! volume of material
00081     integer             :: nisotopes ! number of isotopes
00082 
00083     ! set number of isotopes
00084     this%nisotopes = nisotopes
00085 
00086     ! set volume
00087     this%vol = vol
00088 
00089     ! allocate isotopes array
00090     if (.not. allocated(this%isotopes)) allocate(this%isotopes(this%nisotopes))
00091 
00092     ! set up current isotope index
00093     this%curr_iso = 1
00094 
00095     ! set energy bounds
00096     this%E_min = emin
00097     this%E_max = emax
00098 
00099   end subroutine setup_material
00100 
00101 !===============================================================================
00102 ! LOAD_ISOTOPE
00105 
00106   subroutine load_isotope(this,N,A,path,thermal,name)
00107 
00108     use hdf5
00109 
00110     ! formal variables
00111     type(material_type),target :: this    ! a material
00112     real(8)                    :: N       ! number density
00113     real(8)                    :: A       ! atomic weight
00114     character(len=255)         :: path    ! path to isotope
00115     character(len=255)         :: name    ! name of isotope
00116     logical                    :: thermal ! contains a thermal lib
00117 
00118     ! local variables
00119     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00120     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00121     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00122     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00123     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(2) :: dim2         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00124     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size
00125     type(thermal_type), pointer    :: therm
00126 
00127     ! display to user
00128     write(*,*) 'Loading isotope: ',trim(name)
00129 
00130     ! set parameters
00131     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%N = N
00132     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%A = A
00133     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%alpha = ((A-1)/(A+1))**2 
00134     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal = thermal
00135     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%name = name
00136 
00137     ! open up hdf5 file
00138     call h5fopen_f(trim(path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00139 
00140     ! read size of vector
00141     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00142     dim1 = (/1/)
00143     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00144     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00145 
00146     ! allocate all xs vectors
00147     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat))                  &
00148    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat(vecsize))
00149     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt))                  &
00150    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt(vecsize))
00151     if (.not.allocated(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss))                  &
00152    &         allocate(this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss(vecsize))
00153 
00154 
00155     ! keep the size
00156     this%npts = vecsize
00157 
00158     ! zero out xs vectors
00159     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat = 0.0_8
00160     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt = 0.0_8
00161     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss = 0.0_8
00162 
00163     ! read in xs
00164     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_scat",dataset_id,error)
00165     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00166     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00167    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_scat,dim1,error)
00168     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00169     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_capt",dataset_id,error)
00170     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00171     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00172    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_capt,dim1,error)
00173     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00174     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/xs_fiss",dataset_id,error)
00175     dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00176     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,                               &
00177    &     this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%xs_fiss,dim1,error)
00178     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00179 
00180     ! get energy interval width
00181     call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E_width",dataset_id,error)
00182     dim1 = (/1/)
00183     call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%E_width,dim1,error)
00184     call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00185 
00186     ! check for thermal scattering kernel and load that
00187     if (this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal) then
00188 
00189       ! set pointer
00190       therm => this%isotopes(this%curr_iso)%thermal_lib
00191 
00192       ! load sizes
00193       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kTsize",dataset_id,error)
00194       dim1 = (/1/)
00195       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%kTsize,dim1,error)
00196       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00197       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdfsize",dataset_id,error)
00198       dim1 = (/1/)
00199       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,therm%cdfsize,dim1,error)
00200       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00201 
00202       ! read in cdf width
00203       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00204       dim1 = (/1/)
00205       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%cdf_width,dim1,error)
00206       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00207 
00208       ! preallocate vectors
00209       if(.not.allocated(therm%kTvec)) allocate(therm%kTvec(therm%kTsize))
00210       if(.not.allocated(therm%Erat)) allocate(therm%Erat(therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize))
00211 
00212       ! read in vectors
00213       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/kT",dataset_id,error)
00214       dim1 = (/therm%kTsize/)
00215       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%kTvec,dim1,error)
00216       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00217       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/Erat",dataset_id,error)
00218       dim2 = (/therm%cdfsize,therm%kTsize/)
00219       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,therm%Erat,dim2,error)
00220       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00221 
00222     end if
00223 
00224     ! close hdf5 file
00225     call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00226 
00227     ! increment isotope counter
00228     this%curr_iso = this%curr_iso + 1
00229 
00230   end subroutine load_isotope
00231 
00232 !===============================================================================
00233 ! LOAD_SOURCE
00236 
00237   subroutine load_source(this,source_type,source_path)
00238 
00239     use hdf5 
00240 
00241     ! formal variables
00242     type(material_type) :: this        ! a material
00243     integer             :: source_type ! 0 - fixed, 1 - fission
00244     character(len=255)  :: source_path ! path to source file
00245 
00246     ! local variables
00247     integer                        :: error        ! hdf5 error 
00248     integer(HID_T)                 :: hdf5_file    ! hdf5 file id
00249     integer(HID_T)                 :: dataset_id   ! hdf5 dataset id
00250     integer(HSIZE_T), dimension(1) :: dim1         ! dimension of hdf5 var
00251     integer                        :: vecsize      ! vector size for fission
00252 
00253 
00254     ! check for fission source
00255     if (source_type == 1) then
00256 
00257       ! open the fission source file
00258       call h5fopen_f(trim(source_path),H5F_ACC_RDWR_F,hdf5_file,error)
00259 
00260       ! open dataset and read in vector size
00261       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/vecsize",dataset_id,error)
00262       dim1 = (/1/)
00263       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_INTEGER,vecsize,dim1,error)
00264       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00265 
00266       ! open dataset and read in width of cdf interval
00267       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/cdf_width",dataset_id,error)
00268       dim1 = (/1/)
00269       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%cdf_width,dim1,  &
00270      &               error)
00271       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00272 
00273       ! preallocate vectors in source object
00274       if(.not.allocated(this%source%E)) allocate(this%source%E(vecsize))
00275 
00276       ! open dataset and read in energy vector
00277       call h5dopen_f(hdf5_file,"/E",dataset_id,error)
00278       dim1 = (/vecsize/)
00279       call h5dread_f(dataset_id,H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE,this%source%E,dim1,error)
00280       call h5dclose_f(dataset_id,error)
00281 
00282       ! close the file
00283       call h5fclose_f(hdf5_file,error)
00284 
00285     end if
00286 
00287   end subroutine load_source
00288 
00289 !===============================================================================
00290 ! COMPUTE_MACROXS
00293 
00294   subroutine compute_macroxs(this)
00295 
00296     ! formal variables
00297     type(material_type),target :: this ! a material
00298 
00299     ! local variables
00300     integer                 :: i   ! loop counter
00301     type(iso_type), pointer :: iso ! pointer to current isotope
00302 
00303     ! allocate xs arrays
00304     if (.not.allocated(this%totalxs))                                          &
00305    &                            allocate(this%totalxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00306     if (.not.allocated(this%scattxs))                                          &
00307    &                            allocate(this%scattxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00308     if (.not.allocated(this%absorxs))                                          &
00309    &                            allocate(this%absorxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00310     if (.not.allocated(this%captuxs))                                          &
00311    &                            allocate(this%captuxs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00312     if (.not.allocated(this%fissixs))                                          &
00313    &                            allocate(this%fissixs(this%npts,this%nisotopes))
00314 
00315 
00316     ! zero out total xs
00317     this%totalxs = 0.0_8
00318 
00319     ! begin loop over isotopes
00320     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00321 
00322       ! set pointer to isotope
00323       iso => this%isotopes(i)
00324 
00325       ! multiply microscopic cross section by number density and append
00326       this%captuxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt)
00327       this%fissixs(:,I) = iso%N*(iso%xs_fiss)
00328       this%scattxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_scat)
00329       this%absorxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt + iso%xs_fiss)
00330       this%totalxs(:,i) = iso%N*(iso%xs_capt + iso%xs_fiss + iso%xs_scat)
00331 
00332     end do
00333 
00334   end subroutine compute_macroxs
00335 
00336 !===============================================================================
00337 ! DEALLOCATE_MATERIAL
00340 
00341   subroutine deallocate_material(this)
00342 
00343     ! formal variables
00344     type(material_type) :: this ! a material
00345 
00346     ! local variables
00347     integer :: i ! loop counter
00348 
00349     ! deallocate source information
00350     if (allocated(this%source%E)) deallocate(this%source%E)
00351 
00352     ! begin loop over isotopes for deallocation
00353     do i = 1,this%nisotopes
00354 
00355       ! deallocate thermal library
00356       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%kTvec)) deallocate            &
00357      &             (this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%kTvec)
00358       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%Erat)) deallocate             &
00359      &             (this%isotopes(i)%thermal_lib%Erat)
00360 
00361       ! deallocate xs
00362       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_scat)) deallocate                      &
00363      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_scat)
00364       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_capt)) deallocate                      &
00365      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_capt)
00366       if (allocated(this%isotopes(i)%xs_fiss)) deallocate                      &
00367      &             (this%isotopes(i)%xs_fiss)
00368     end do
00369 
00370     ! deallocate isotopes
00371     if (allocated(this%isotopes)) deallocate(this%isotopes) 
00372 
00373     ! deallocate macro xs
00374     if (allocated(this%totalxs)) deallocate(this%totalxs)
00375     if (allocated(this%scattxs)) deallocate(this%scattxs)
00376     if (allocated(this%absorxs)) deallocate(this%absorxs)
00377     if (allocated(this%captuxs)) deallocate(this%captuxs)
00378     if (allocated(this%fissixs)) deallocate(this%fissixs)
00379 
00380   end subroutine deallocate_material
00381
